document.full_text: the cash-hungry port authority of new york and new jersey year might raise bridge and tunnel tolls by 25 percent during peak commuting periods by the end of the year, the new york post reported on tuesday.
document.title: ny-nj port authority may raise tolls: report
lines_and_colors: the cash-hungry port authority of new york and new jersey year might raise bridge and tunnel tolls by 25 percent during peak commuting periods by the end of the year, the new york post reported on tuesday.
